citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs and rabbits on hand was not available for review. A total of 27 guinea pigs including 21
adults and 6 offspring and a total of 91 rabbits including 41 adults, 12 weanlings, and 38 newborns were counted during
this inspection. There were no inventory records except for some bunnies born indicating the number of adult animals,
weanlings, and newborns present or animals that died in the last few months. Failure to keep maintain records on the
number of animals born, raised, or died makes it difficult to assess the health of the rabbitry and caviary. Licensee must
maintain records containing the required information for animals which disclose the number of animals held, owned,
acquired or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by March 14, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of guinea pigs and rabbits on hand was not available  for review. A total of 27 guinea pigs including 21 
adults and 6 offspring and a total of 91 rabbits including 41 adults, 12 weanlings, and 38 newborns were counted during 
this inspection. There were no inventory records except for some bunnies born indicating the number of adult animals, 
weanlings, and newborns present or animals that died in the last few months. Failure to keep maintain records on the 
number of animals born, raised, or died makes it difficult to assess the health of the rabbitry and caviary. Licensee must 
maintain records containing the required information for animals which disclose the number of animals held, owned, 
acquired or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by March 14, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
